description: Define ISlaBackend interface with startSlaTracking, pauseSla, resumeSla, completeSla, cancelSla, and getSlaStatus methods
Create SlaBackendFactory that returns TemporalSlaBackend for EE and PgBossSlaBackend for CE
Implement PgBossSlaBackend that delegates to existing slaPauseService and slaService methods
Create SlaTicketWorkflow in ee/temporal-workflows/src/workflows/ with response and resolution phase tracking
SlaTicketWorkflow accepts input: ticketId, tenantId, policyTargets, businessHoursSchedule
SlaTicketWorkflow maintains state: currentPhase, pauseState, notifiedThresholds, responseDeadline, resolutionDeadline
SlaTicketWorkflow uses Temporal sleep() to wake at each threshold percentage
SlaTicketWorkflow handles 'pause' signal by recording pauseStartedAt and canceling pending timer
SlaTicketWorkflow handles 'resume' signal by recalculating remaining time and setting new timer
SlaTicketWorkflow handles 'completeResponse' signal by marking response complete and transitioning to resolution phase
SlaTicketWorkflow handles 'completeResolution' signal by marking resolution complete and terminating workflow
SlaTicketWorkflow handles 'cancel' signal by terminating workflow without recording breach
SlaTicketWorkflow supports 'getState' query returning currentStatus, remainingTime, pauseState
Create calculateNextWakeTime activity that computes wall-clock time for next threshold using business hours calculator
calculateNextWakeTime handles start time outside business hours by advancing to next business period
calculateNextWakeTime accounts for accumulated pause minutes when computing remaining time
Create sendSlaNotification activity that calls existing slaNotificationService.sendSlaNotification()
Create checkAndEscalate activity that calls escalationService.checkEscalationNeeded() and escalateTicket()
Create updateSlaStatus activity that updates ticket sla_* fields in database
Create recordSlaAuditLog activity that inserts entries into sla_audit_log table
Implement TemporalSlaBackend.startSlaTracking() that starts SlaTicketWorkflow
TemporalSlaBackend uses workflow ID format sla-ticket-{tenantId}-{ticketId}
TemporalSlaBackend.pauseSla() sends pause signal to running workflow
TemporalSlaBackend.resumeSla() sends resume signal to running workflow
TemporalSlaBackend.completeSla() sends completeResponse or completeResolution signal based on type
TemporalSlaBackend.cancelSla() sends cancel signal to running workflow
TemporalSlaBackend.getSlaStatus() queries workflow state via getState query
Modify slaService.startSlaForTicket() to call backend.startSlaTracking() after setting up ticket
Modify slaPauseService.pauseSla() to call backend.pauseSla() after updating ticket
Modify slaPauseService.resumeSla() to call backend.resumeSla() after updating ticket
Modify slaService.recordFirstResponse() to call backend.completeSla('response') after updating ticket
Modify slaService.recordResolution() to call backend.completeSla('resolution') after updating ticket
SlaBackendFactory falls back to PgBossSlaBackend when Temporal client unavailable
Log warning when falling back from Temporal to pgboss
TemporalSlaBackend.startSlaTracking() is idempotent (handles duplicate workflow ID gracefully)
Handle ticket deletion by calling backend.cancelSla() to terminate any running workflow
Handle SLA policy change by calling backend.cancelSla() then backend.startSlaTracking() with new policy
SlaTicketWorkflow sends notification at 50% threshold via sendSlaNotification activity
SlaTicketWorkflow sends notification at 75% threshold via sendSlaNotification activity
SlaTicketWorkflow sends notification at 90% threshold via sendSlaNotification activity
SlaTicketWorkflow marks breach at 100% threshold via updateSlaStatus activity
SlaTicketWorkflow checks escalation at each threshold via checkAndEscalate activity
Add sla-workflows task queue to Temporal worker configuration
Register SlaTicketWorkflow in Temporal worker workflow list
Register SLA activities in Temporal worker activities list
Create CE stub for TemporalSlaBackend that throws 'only available in Enterprise Edition'
PgBossSlaBackend.startSlaTracking() is a no-op (deadlines already stored)
PgBossSlaBackend.cancelSla() is a no-op (polling naturally excludes deleted tickets)
PgBossSlaBackend.getSlaStatus() delegates to existing slaService.getSlaStatus()
SlaTicketWorkflow handles 24x7 business hours schedule (no business hours adjustment)
